name: mpass-circuits
description: ZK circuits for mPass identity verification on Mantle - Enhanced with nullifiers, Merkle trees, and passport verification

scripts.build:all: npm run build:age-v2 && npm run build:jurisdiction && npm run build:accredited && npm run build:identity && npm run build:passport
scripts.setup:age: snarkjs groth16 setup build/age-v2/age_proof_v2.r1cs pot16_final.ptau build/age-v2/age_proof_v2.zkey
scripts.setup:identity: snarkjs groth16 setup build/identity/identity_proof.r1cs pot16_final.ptau build/identity/identity_proof.zkey
scripts.setup:passport: snarkjs groth16 setup build/passport/passport_proof.r1cs pot16_final.ptau build/passport/passport_proof.zkey
scripts.export:verifiers: npm run export:age-verifier && npm run export:identity-verifier && npm run export:passport-verifier
